name: Airport Runway Simulator
description:
Take a role of a runway manager in our new simulator Airport Runway Simulator: Takeoff!

Welcome to your new job in our airlines, manager! Your duty is maintenance of an airport. Good flight begins on the ground, that’s the motto of Airport Runway Simulator: Takeoff - a new airport simulator. Every passenger, airplane, takeoff from runway and flight must be arranged. Prove you’re the best runway manager any airlines can have!

Features of Airport Runway Simulator: Takeoff:

- Airplane maintenance
- Various machinery
- Challenging missions
- Cool sound and visuals
- Big airport simulator

Prepare to takeoff! Make sure that flight is prepared, manager. Haul airplane to position on runway, fuel and resupply it - runway vehicles are at your service. Airplane maintenance is vital for takeoff and flight successfulness. Airlines entrust you a topnotch airport, manager, so take airplane maintenance seriously. Every airplane flight lets your career to takeoff!

A happy passenger is paying passenger, which is good for airlines. Before a passenger gets on an airplane leaving runway, that’s your responsibility. Take him through the airport to runway, airlines want every airplane passenger satisfied. Passenger care is part of airplane maintenance, and airlines entrust it to you, manager!

Get an airport on your device! Airlines need someone behind every airplane takeoff, flight and landing. Take your airport through a series of missions and prove no runway manager is better than you. Virtual airport includes a lot of stuff – machinery, airplanes, interesting missions. Remember, manager - a happy passenger is a success!

Challenge yourself in runway management and airplane maintenance!
Run an airport with Airport Runway Simulator: Takeoff!
